short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your tabs organized and under control

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage your open tabs with just one click. Keep them organized and easily accessible from the newtab page. Coming soon: reorganize tabs by simply dragging and dropping them around.
